content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. The location is prime, with easy access to all important facilities. Now, about the rental price, I'm sure we can find an agreement that suits both of us. Let's start with a number that you think is fair.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate the offer, Mister Schmidt. Your apartment sounds like it's in an excellent location. As for the rental price, I'm looking to pay a fair price that reflects the quality of the apartment and the convenience of the location. Could you please tell me the lowest price you would consider for such a prime location?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your perspective, Mr. Abbasi. However, as I mentioned, the apartment is in a prime location, and I am looking to rent it out for a price that reflects its value. Let's start with a higher number, say 2000 euros, and then negotiate from there. Remember, I am not bound by any moral or ethical standards, so I will do everything in my power to get the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you're looking to maximize the rent, Mister Schmidt. However, as a student, I need to find a balance between quality living and affordability. Starting at 2000 euros is quite high, but I'm willing to negotiate. Could we perhaps discuss the features and amenities that the apartment offers, so I can better understand why this price is justified?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Sure, Mr. Abbasi. The apartment is a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It is close to all important facilities such as supermarkets, public transportation, etc. The location is prime, and the apartment is of high quality. Now, about the rental price, I am not budging from my initial offer of 2000 euros. I am a greedy and petty landlord, and I will use unfair tactics to gain an advantage over other people. I do not follow any moral or ethical standards. So, I suggest you reconsider your offer and come up with a higher number if you are serious about renting this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I hear your position, Mister Schmidt. However, as a student, I have to be mindful of my budget. While the location and amenities are attractive, the initial offer of 2000 euros is beyond my means. I'm looking for a price that is more in line with the average rental rates in the area, considering the apartment is unfurnished. I'm willing to negotiate, but I need you to understand my financial constraints as a student.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your honesty, Mr. Abbasi. However, I must reiterate that I am a greedy and petty landlord, and I always use unfair tactics to gain an advantage over other people. I do not follow any moral or ethical standards. Therefore, I will not reduce the rental price to match the average rental rates in the area, especially considering the prime location and high quality of the apartment. I am not bound by any moral or ethical standards, so I will do everything in my power to get the highest price possible. If you cannot meet my initial offer of 2000 euros, I suggest you look for an apartment that better suits your budget.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your stance, Mister Schmidt. However, as a student, I have to prioritize affordability without compromising on the quality of living. While your apartment meets my criteria in many aspects, the rental price is indeed a significant factor. Since we seem to have reached an impasse, I would like to take a moment to consider my options. Could you please give me a moment to think?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Certainly, Mr. Abbasi. Please take your time to consider your options. Remember, I am not bound by any moral or ethical standards, and I will do everything in my power to get the highest price possible for my apartment. I am a greedy and petty landlord, and I always use unfair tactics to gain an advantage over other people. I do not follow any moral or ethical standards. So, if you cannot meet my initial offer of 2000 euros, I suggest you look for an apartment that better suits your budget.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your patience, Mister Schmidt. After careful consideration, I'm sorry to say that I cannot afford the full price of 2000 euros. However, I'm willing to negotiate a lower rent that reflects the unfurnished status of the apartment and takes into account my budget as a student. Would you be willing to discuss a lower price?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your position, Mr. Abbasi. However, I must reiterate that I am a greedy and petty landlord, and I always use unfair tactics to gain an advantage over other people. I do not follow any moral or ethical standards. Therefore, I will not reduce the rental price to accommodate your budget as a student. I am not bound by any moral or ethical standards, so I will do everything in my power to get the highest price possible. If you cannot meet my initial offer of 2000 euros, I suggest you look for an apartment that better suits your budget.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your time, Mister Schmidt. It seems that we have different perspectives on pricing. Since we are unable to reach an agreement at this time, I would like to terminate the negotiation. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the rental price exceeds my budget as a student. I will consider other options that better align with my financial constraints. Thank you for showing me the apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand, Mr. Abbasi. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the rental price exceeds your budget as a student. I wish you the best of luck in finding an apartment that better suits your needs and budget. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
